data.name: Ogre's Journey
data.detailed_description:
In Ogre's Journey you play as a young ogre who has come of age to undergo the three trials every member of the Stonetooth Clan must take before finding their place in the wider world - providing for the clan, paying tribute to the dragons, and honouring the clan's ancestors. After starting on your mission your trials are soon derailed, resulting in an epic adventure to help save your clan and the Shattered Skies. Partake in quests in an stylized open world. Equip yourself with an array of armour, weapons and accessories. Delve into mini-dungeons for exotic rewards and find hidden collectables through the world to unlock rare minipets, weapons and armour.



Main Features:
  • Fight enemies using classic tab target combat inspired by old school MMORPG's and RPGs.
  • Play as the marauder class and utilise an array of abilities from three different specialisations; Rage, Fear, Fury.
  • Adventure through a stylized open world known as the Shattered Skies and discover interesting locales such tropical forests, winding canyons and bubbling lava fields.
  • Stop the rising darkness seeking to destroy your clan and the Shattered Skies in a series of story-driven quests.

Other Features:
  • Delve into challenging mini-dungeons to fight bosses for exotic rewards used to increase your power or alter your appearance.
  • Learn and craft an array of recipes, from a simple potion used to return your health to accessories that improve your stats.
  • Collect a plethora of equipment and items such as armour, accessories, weapons, minipets, potions and books.
  • Solve puzzles and find collectables hidden throughout the world.
  • Build up your reputation with various factions for unique rewards.

data.short_description: Ogre's Journey is an RPG in which you play as a young ogre, seeking to find their place in the world and ultimately save their clan from a rising danger. Explore a stylized open world, fight using traditional tab target combat, complete quests and collect a plethora of equipment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
